summary: This document is a chain of emails from July 2019 between FBI personnel, including a Victim Specialist and a Program Manager, coordinating logistics for potential victim interviews related to the Epstein case in West Palm Beach, Florida. The emails discuss scheduling and availability for meetings with victims.

persons.name: Victim Specialist
persons.context: FBI Victim Specialist coordinating with a Program Manager regarding potential Epstein victim interviews in West Palm Beach.

persons.name: Program Manager
persons.context: FBI Program Manager responding to coordination emails about victim interviews.

persons.name: Case Agent
persons.context: Mentioned as heading to Florida for scheduled interviews with potential Epstein victims.

connections.description: Coordinating logistics for victim interviews related to the Epstein investigation.
Victim Specialist communicated with the Case Agent about victim interviews and service requests.

events.title: Scheduled victim interviews
events.description: Interviews with potential Epstein victims were scheduled for 11 AM and 3 PM in West Palm Beach.

events.title: Case Agent travel to Florida
events.description: The Case Agent was reported to be heading to Florida for the investigation.

keyFacts: FBI personnel were actively coordinating victim interviews in West Palm Beach related to the Epstein case in July 2019.
Interviews with potential victims were scheduled for July 11, 2019, at 11 AM and 3 PM.
The emails indicate a structured process for victim services and interview logistics within the FBI investigation.
The correspondence is marked as sensitive and covered by the Electronic Communication Privacy Act, emphasizing confidentiality.
